ValidationRule.description:
Do not allow an NPS Surveyor to edit the NPS Response of a closed NPS Survey more than 60 days after the Survey was submitted.
NOTE: The error message deliberately says 30 days even though it is only triggered after 60 Days.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(NPS__r.Status__c, "Closed"), $User.Id = NPS__r.NPS_Surveyor__c, NPS__r.Reviewed__c < TODAY() - 60
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You may only edit this Response upto 30 Days after the NPS Survey was submitted. Please contact an Administrator to arrange for the necessary changes to be made.
